sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form>
    <input
      v-model="playlist.title"
      class="input"
      type="text"
      placeholder="Название плейлиста"
    >
    <button @click="createPlaylist">
      Создать
    </button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>

  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        playlist: {
          title: '',

        }
      }
    },

    methods: {
      createPlaylist() {
        this.playlist.id = Date.now();
        this.$emit('create', this.playlist)
        this.playlist = {
          title: ''
        }
        this.dialogVisible = false;
      },
    }
  }
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
